ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Sit-in
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats Great to hear that your friend enjoys playing his paladin, perhaps all is not lost. My thoughts on it though are this, Sure you can buff the pally up,
ygData.messageBody:
Thats Great to hear that your friend enjoys playing his paladin, perhaps all
is not lost.
My thoughts on it though are this, Sure you can buff the pally up, he's got
a good amount of HP, but the funny thing is, is this...because he is not
dishing the damage, the mobs pay absolutely no attention to him, so......I
don't have to heal him.
Saturday night we did the fire giants, Not once through the whole night did
I have to heal the paladin......I must also add to that though, if he wasn't
there I would have died, he had to Lay Hands on me, Fire Giant decided I was
to be his next meal apparently, lol

I agree everyone looks at their roles differently, just like clerics play
varying levels of our class, I'm sure the other classes play that way as
well. What bothers me is to see someone playing a game we choose to play,
devote immense amounts of time to, pay for, then not have any incentives to
continue. No sense of accomplishment or satisfaction for their efforts,
instead Verant continues to take away and/or neglect the classes that need
the most help.

Bree Wyndsdale
